action_list.description: System action for creating an application

attrs.script:
#!/bin/sh

yum -y update
yum -y upgrade

yum -y install net-tools bind-utils bash-completion nano firewalld

echo "yum updates completed!" >> ~/status.txt

hostnamectl set-hostname openldap-host

echo "hostname configured!" >> ~/status.txt

yum -y install openldap compat-openldap openldap-clients openldap-servers openldap-servers-sql openldap-devel

echo "openldap packages installed!" >> ~/status.txt

systemctl start slapd.service
systemctl enable slapd.service

echo "openldap services enabled and started!" >> ~/status.txt

netstat -antup | grep -i 389 >> ~/status.txt

echo "openldap status status - see above" >> ~/status.txt

yum -y install firewalld

systemctl start firewalld
systemctl enable firewalld

firewall-cmd --permanent --add-service=ldap
firewall-cmd --reload

echo "firewall configured!" >> ~/status.txt

sed -i -- 's/SELINUX=enforcing/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/selinux/config

attrs.script:
#!/bin/sh

echo 'dn: olcDatabase={2}hdb,cn=config
changetype: modify
replace: olcSuffix
olcSuffix: dc=ntnxdemo,dc=local

dn: olcDatabase={2}hdb,cn=config
changetype: modify
replace: olcRootDN
olcRootDN: cn=ldapadm,dc=ntnxdemo,dc=local

dn: olcDatabase={2}hdb,cn=config
changetype: modify
replace: olcRootPW' | tee ~/db.ldif

/usr/sbin/slappasswd -n -s @@{OPENLDAP_PASSWORD}@@ > ~/hash.txt

echo "olcRootPW: `cat ~/hash.txt`" >> ~/db.ldif

/usr/bin/ldapmodify -Y EXTERNAL  -H ldapi:/// -f ~/db.ldif

echo "openldap configured!" >> ~/status.txt

echo 'dn: olcDatabase={1}monitor,cn=config
changetype: modify
replace: olcAccess
olcAccess: {0}to * by dn.base="gidNumber=0+uidNumber=0,cn=peercred,cn=external, cn=auth" read by dn.base="cn=ldapadm,dc=ntnxdemo,dc=local" read by * none
' | tee ~/monitor.ldif

/usr/bin/ldapmodify -Y EXTERNAL  -H ldapi:/// -f ~/monitor.ldif

echo "openldap restrict monitor access configured!" >> ~/status.txt

/usr/bin/openssl req -new -x509 -subj '/C=@@{CERTIFICATE_COUNTRY}@@/ST=@@{CERTIFICATE_STATE}@@/L=@@{CERTIFICATE_CITY}@@/CN=ntnxdemo.local' -nodes -out /etc/openldap/certs/ntnxdemo.pem -keyout /etc/openldap/certs/ntnxdemo.pem -days 365
chown -R ldap:ldap /etc/openldap/certs/*.pem
ll /etc/openldap/certs/*.pem >> ~/status.txt

echo "certificate created!" >> ~/status.txt

echo 'dn: cn=config
changetype: modify
replace: olcTLSCertificateFile
olcTLSCertificateFile: /etc/openldap/certs/ntnxdemo.pem

dn: cn=config
changetype: modify
replace: olcTLSCertificateKeyFile
olcTLSCertificateKeyFile: /etc/openldap/certs/ntnxdemo.pem
' | tee ~/certs.ldif

/usr/bin/ldapmodify -Y EXTERNAL  -H ldapi:/// -f ~/certs.ldif

echo "openldap secure communication configured!" >> ~/status.txt

cp /usr/share/openldap-servers/DB_CONFIG.example /var/lib/ldap/DB_CONFIG
chown ldap:ldap /var/lib/ldap/*

/usr/bin/ldapadd -Y EXTERNAL -H ldapi:/// -f /etc/openldap/schema/cosine.ldif
/usr/bin/ldapadd -Y EXTERNAL -H ldapi:/// -f /etc/openldap/schema/nis.ldif 
/usr/bin/ldapadd -Y EXTERNAL -H ldapi:/// -f /etc/openldap/schema/inetorgperson.ldif

echo 'dn: dc=ntnxdemo,dc=local
dc: ntnxdemo
objectClass: top
objectClass: domain

dn: cn=ldapadm,dc=ntnxdemo,dc=local
objectClass: organizationalRole
cn: ldapadm
description: LDAP Manager

dn: ou=People,dc=ntnxdemo,dc=local
objectClass: organizationalUnit
ou: People

dn: ou=Group,dc=ntnxdemo,dc=local
objectClass: organizationalUnit
ou: Group
' | tee ~/base.ldif

/usr/bin/ldapadd -x -w @@{OPENLDAP_PASSWORD}@@ -D "cn=ldapadm,dc=ntnxdemo,dc=local" -f ~/base.ldif

echo "openldap database setup!" >> ~/status.txt

echo "local4.* /var/log/ldap.log" >> /etc/rsyslog.conf
systemctl restart rsyslog

echo "logging configured!" >> ~/status.txt

attrs.script:
/usr/sbin/slaptest -u >> ~/status.txt

echo "look for 'config file testing succeeded' above" >> ~/status.txt
echo "openldap configuration completed!" >> ~/status.txt

# create the built-in users
echo "dn: uid=@@{ADMIN_USER}@@,ou=People,dc=ntnxdemo,dc=local
objectClass: top
objectClass: account
objectClass: posixAccount
objectClass: shadowAccount
cn: @@{ADMIN_USER}@@
uid: @@{ADMIN_USER}@@
uidNumber: 1021
gidNumber: 101
homeDirectory: /home/@@{ADMIN_USER}@@
loginShell: /bin/bash
gecos: OpenLDAP Administrator
userPassword: @@{ADMIN_PASSWORD}@@
shadowLastChange: 17023
shadowMin: 0
shadowMax: 99999
shadowWarning: 7

dn: uid=@@{READONLY_USER}@@,ou=People,dc=ntnxdemo,dc=local
objectClass: top
objectClass: account
objectClass: posixAccount
objectClass: shadowAccount
cn: @@{READONLY_USER}@@
uid: @@{READONLY_USER}@@
uidNumber: 2022
gidNumber: 102
homeDirectory: /home/@@{READONLY_USER}@@
loginShell: /bin/bash
gecos: Cluster View Only user
userPassword: @@{READONLY_PASSWORD}@@
shadowLastChange: 17023
shadowMin: 0
shadowMax: 99999
shadowWarning: 7" | tee ~/builtInUsers.ldif

# create the built-in groups
echo "dn: cn=ClusterAdmin,ou=Group,dc=ntnxdemo,dc=local
cn: ClusterAdmin
objectClass: top
objectClass: posixGroup
gidNumber: 101
memberUid: @@{ADMIN_USER}@@

dn: cn=Viewer,ou=Group,dc=ntnxdemo,dc=local
cn: Viewer
objectClass: top
objectClass: posixGroup
gidNumber: 102
memberUid: @@{READONLY_USER}@@" | tee ~/builtInGroups.ldif

/usr/bin/ldapadd -x -w @@{OPENLDAP_PASSWORD}@@ -D "cn=ldapadm,dc=ntnxdemo,dc=local" -f ~/builtInUsers.ldif
/usr/bin/ldapadd -x -w @@{OPENLDAP_PASSWORD}@@ -D "cn=ldapadm,dc=ntnxdemo,dc=local" -f ~/builtInGroups.ldif

# verify the new user was added

ldapsearch -x cn=@@{ADMIN_USER}@@ -b dc=ntnxdemo,dc=local >> ~/status.txt

attrs.script:
#!/bin/sh

yum -y update
yum -y upgrade

yum -y install net-tools bind-utils bash-completion nano firewalld

echo "yum updates completed!" >> ~/status.txt

hostnamectl set-hostname openldap-client

echo "hostname configured!" >> ~/status.txt

yum install -y openldap-clients nss-pam-ldapd

authconfig --enableldap --enableldapauth --ldapserver=@@{OpenLDAPServer.address}@@ --ldapbasedn="dc=ntnxdemo,dc=local" --enablemkhomedir --update

systemctl restart nslcd

getent passwd @@{READONLY_USER}@@ >> ~/status.txt

attrs.script:
#!/bin/sh

yum -y update
yum -y upgrade

yum -y install net-tools bind-utils bash-completion nano firewalld

echo "yum updates completed!" >> ~/status.txt

firewall-cmd --permanent --add-service=http
firewall-cmd --reload

hostnamectl set-hostname openldap-gui

echo "hostname configured!" >> ~/status.txt

yum -y install epel-release

rpm -Uvh https://mirror.webtatic.com/yum/el7/webtatic-release.rpm
yum install -y httpd php56w php56w-mysql

sudo systemctl restart httpd
sudo systemctl enable httpd

echo "<IfModule mod_dir.c>
        DirectoryIndex index.php index.html index.cgi index.pl index.php index.xhtml index.htm
</IfModule>" | sudo tee /etc/httpd/conf.modules.d/dir.conf

echo "<?php
phpinfo();
?>" | sudo tee /var/www/html/info.php

yum install -y phpldapadmin

sed -i -- 's/Require local/Require all granted/' /etc/httpd/conf.d/phpldapadmin.conf
systemctl restart httpd

sed -i -- 's/Local LDAP Server/NTNXDemo LDAP Server/' /etc/phpldapadmin/config.php
sed -i -- 's/127\.0\.0\.1/@@{OpenLDAPServer.address}@@/' /etc/phpldapadmin/config.php
sed -i '298s/\/\/ //' /etc/phpldapadmin/config.php
sed -i '397s/\/\/ //' /etc/phpldapadmin/config.php
sed -i '398s/^/\/\/ /' /etc/phpldapadmin/config.php
setsebool -P httpd_can_connect_ldap on
sed -i -- 's/SELINUX=enforcing/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/selinux/config

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash

echo 'dn: uid=@@{NEW_USER_TO_ADD}@@,ou=People,dc=ntnxdemo,dc=local
objectClass: top
objectClass: account
objectClass: posixAccount
objectClass: shadowAccount
cn: @@{NEW_USER_TO_ADD}@@
uid: @@{NEW_USER_TO_ADD}@@
uidNumber: 9999
gidNumber: 100
homeDirectory: /home/@@{NEW_USER_TO_ADD}@@
loginShell: /bin/bash
gecos: @@{NEW_USER_ROLE}@@
userPassword: @@{USER_PASSWORD}@@
shadowLastChange: 17058
shadowMin: 0
shadowMax: 99999
shadowWarning: 7
ou: Group
' | tee ~/@@{NEW_USER_TO_ADD}@@.ldif

/usr/bin/ldapadd -x -w @@{OPENLDAP_PASSWORD}@@ -D "cn=ldapadm,dc=ntnxdemo,dc=local" -f ~/@@{NEW_USER_TO_ADD}@@.ldif

/usr/sbin/slaptest -u >> ~/status.txt

# verify the new user was added

ldapsearch -x cn=@@{NEW_USER_TO_ADD}@@ -b dc=ntnxdemo,dc=local >> ~/status.txt

attrs.script:
#!/bin/sh

echo 'dn: olcDatabase={2}hdb,cn=config
changetype: modify
replace: olcSuffix
olcSuffix: dc=ntnxdemo,dc=local

dn: olcDatabase={2}hdb,cn=config
changetype: modify
replace: olcRootDN
olcRootDN: cn=ldapadm,dc=ntnxdemo,dc=local

dn: olcDatabase={2}hdb,cn=config
changetype: modify
replace: olcRootPW' | tee ~/db.ldif

/usr/sbin/slappasswd -n -s @@{OPENLDAP_PASSWORD}@@ > ~/hash.txt

echo "olcRootPW: `cat ~/hash.txt`" >> ~/db.ldif

/usr/bin/ldapmodify -Y EXTERNAL  -H ldapi:/// -f ~/db.ldif

echo "openldap configured!" >> ~/status.txt

echo 'dn: olcDatabase={1}monitor,cn=config
changetype: modify
replace: olcAccess
olcAccess: {0}to * by dn.base="gidNumber=0+uidNumber=0,cn=peercred,cn=external, cn=auth" read by dn.base="cn=ldapadm,dc=ntnxdemo,dc=local" read by * none
' | tee ~/monitor.ldif

/usr/bin/ldapmodify -Y EXTERNAL  -H ldapi:/// -f ~/monitor.ldif

echo "openldap restrict monitor access configured!" >> ~/status.txt

/usr/bin/openssl req -new -x509 -subj '/C=@@{CERTIFICATE_COUNTRY}@@/ST=@@{CERTIFICATE_STATE}@@/L=@@{CERTIFICATE_CITY}@@/CN=ntnxdemo.local' -nodes -out /etc/openldap/certs/ntnxdemo.pem -keyout /etc/openldap/certs/ntnxdemo.pem -days 365
chown -R ldap:ldap /etc/openldap/certs/*.pem
ll /etc/openldap/certs/*.pem >> ~/status.txt

echo "certificate created!" >> ~/status.txt

echo 'dn: cn=config
changetype: modify
replace: olcTLSCertificateFile
olcTLSCertificateFile: /etc/openldap/certs/ntnxdemo.pem

dn: cn=config
changetype: modify
replace: olcTLSCertificateKeyFile
olcTLSCertificateKeyFile: /etc/openldap/certs/ntnxdemo.pem
' | tee ~/certs.ldif

/usr/bin/ldapmodify -Y EXTERNAL  -H ldapi:/// -f ~/certs.ldif

echo "openldap secure communication configured!" >> ~/status.txt

cp /usr/share/openldap-servers/DB_CONFIG.example /var/lib/ldap/DB_CONFIG
chown ldap:ldap /var/lib/ldap/*

/usr/bin/ldapadd -Y EXTERNAL -H ldapi:/// -f /etc/openldap/schema/cosine.ldif
/usr/bin/ldapadd -Y EXTERNAL -H ldapi:/// -f /etc/openldap/schema/nis.ldif 
/usr/bin/ldapadd -Y EXTERNAL -H ldapi:/// -f /etc/openldap/schema/inetorgperson.ldif

echo 'dn: dc=ntnxdemo,dc=local
dc: ntnxdemo
objectClass: top
objectClass: domain

dn: cn=ldapadm,dc=ntnxdemo,dc=local
objectClass: organizationalRole
cn: ldapadm
description: LDAP Manager

dn: ou=People,dc=ntnxdemo,dc=local
objectClass: organizationalUnit
ou: People

dn: ou=Group,dc=ntnxdemo,dc=local
objectClass: organizationalUnit
ou: Group
' | tee ~/base.ldif

/usr/bin/ldapadd -x -w @@{OPENLDAP_PASSWORD}@@ -D "cn=ldapadm,dc=ntnxdemo,dc=local" -f ~/base.ldif

echo "openldap database setup!" >> ~/status.txt

echo "local4.* /var/log/ldap.log" >> /etc/rsyslog.conf
systemctl restart rsyslog

echo "logging configured!" >> ~/status.txt

action_list.description: System action for deleting an application. Deletes physical machines as well
action_list.name: action_delete

action_list.description: System action for starting an application
action_list.name: action_start

action_list.description: System action for stopping an application
action_list.name: action_stop

action_list.description: System action for restarting an application
action_list.name: action_restart

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

attrs.script:
/usr/sbin/slaptest -u >> ~/status.txt

echo "look for 'config file testing succeeded' above" >> ~/status.txt
echo "openldap configuration completed!" >> ~/status.txt

# create the built-in users
echo "dn: uid=@@{ADMIN_USER}@@,ou=People,dc=ntnxdemo,dc=local
objectClass: top
objectClass: account
objectClass: posixAccount
objectClass: shadowAccount
cn: @@{ADMIN_USER}@@
uid: @@{ADMIN_USER}@@
uidNumber: 1021
gidNumber: 101
homeDirectory: /home/@@{ADMIN_USER}@@
loginShell: /bin/bash
gecos: OpenLDAP Administrator
userPassword: @@{ADMIN_PASSWORD}@@
shadowLastChange: 17023
shadowMin: 0
shadowMax: 99999
shadowWarning: 7

dn: uid=@@{READONLY_USER}@@,ou=People,dc=ntnxdemo,dc=local
objectClass: top
objectClass: account
objectClass: posixAccount
objectClass: shadowAccount
cn: @@{READONLY_USER}@@
uid: @@{READONLY_USER}@@
uidNumber: 2022
gidNumber: 102
homeDirectory: /home/@@{READONLY_USER}@@
loginShell: /bin/bash
gecos: Cluster View Only user
userPassword: @@{READONLY_PASSWORD}@@
shadowLastChange: 17023
shadowMin: 0
shadowMax: 99999
shadowWarning: 7" | tee ~/builtInUsers.ldif

# create the built-in groups
echo "dn: cn=ClusterAdmin,ou=Group,dc=ntnxdemo,dc=local
cn: ClusterAdmin
objectClass: top
objectClass: posixGroup
gidNumber: 101
memberUid: @@{ADMIN_USER}@@

dn: cn=Viewer,ou=Group,dc=ntnxdemo,dc=local
cn: Viewer
objectClass: top
objectClass: posixGroup
gidNumber: 102
memberUid: @@{READONLY_USER}@@" | tee ~/builtInGroups.ldif

/usr/bin/ldapadd -x -w @@{OPENLDAP_PASSWORD}@@ -D "cn=ldapadm,dc=ntnxdemo,dc=local" -f ~/builtInUsers.ldif
/usr/bin/ldapadd -x -w @@{OPENLDAP_PASSWORD}@@ -D "cn=ldapadm,dc=ntnxdemo,dc=local" -f ~/builtInGroups.ldif

# verify the new user was added

ldapsearch -x cn=@@{ADMIN_USER}@@ -b dc=ntnxdemo,dc=local >> ~/status.txt

action_list.description: System action for deleting an application. Deletes physical machines as well
action_list.name: action_delete

attrs.script:
#!/bin/sh

yum -y update
yum -y upgrade

yum -y install net-tools bind-utils bash-completion nano firewalld

echo "yum updates completed!" >> ~/status.txt

hostnamectl set-hostname openldap-client

echo "hostname configured!" >> ~/status.txt

yum install -y openldap-clients nss-pam-ldapd

authconfig --enableldap --enableldapauth --ldapserver=@@{OpenLDAPServer.address}@@ --ldapbasedn="dc=ntnxdemo,dc=local" --enablemkhomedir --update

systemctl restart nslcd

getent passwd @@{READONLY_USER}@@ >> ~/status.txt

attrs.script:
#!/bin/sh

yum -y update
yum -y upgrade

yum -y install net-tools bind-utils bash-completion nano firewalld

echo "yum updates completed!" >> ~/status.txt

firewall-cmd --permanent --add-service=http
firewall-cmd --reload

hostnamectl set-hostname openldap-gui

echo "hostname configured!" >> ~/status.txt

yum -y install epel-release

rpm -Uvh https://mirror.webtatic.com/yum/el7/webtatic-release.rpm
yum install -y httpd php56w php56w-mysql

sudo systemctl restart httpd
sudo systemctl enable httpd

echo "<IfModule mod_dir.c>
        DirectoryIndex index.php index.html index.cgi index.pl index.php index.xhtml index.htm
</IfModule>" | sudo tee /etc/httpd/conf.modules.d/dir.conf

echo "<?php
phpinfo();
?>" | sudo tee /var/www/html/info.php

yum install -y phpldapadmin

sed -i -- 's/Require local/Require all granted/' /etc/httpd/conf.d/phpldapadmin.conf
systemctl restart httpd

sed -i -- 's/Local LDAP Server/NTNXDemo LDAP Server/' /etc/phpldapadmin/config.php
sed -i -- 's/127\.0\.0\.1/@@{OpenLDAPServer.address}@@/' /etc/phpldapadmin/config.php
sed -i '298s/\/\/ //' /etc/phpldapadmin/config.php
sed -i '397s/\/\/ //' /etc/phpldapadmin/config.php
sed -i '398s/^/\/\/ /' /etc/phpldapadmin/config.php
setsebool -P httpd_can_connect_ldap on
sed -i -- 's/SELINUX=enforcing/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/selinux/config

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash

echo 'dn: uid=@@{NEW_USER_TO_ADD}@@,ou=People,dc=ntnxdemo,dc=local
objectClass: top
objectClass: account
objectClass: posixAccount
objectClass: shadowAccount
cn: @@{NEW_USER_TO_ADD}@@
uid: @@{NEW_USER_TO_ADD}@@
uidNumber: 9999
gidNumber: 100
homeDirectory: /home/@@{NEW_USER_TO_ADD}@@
loginShell: /bin/bash
gecos: @@{NEW_USER_ROLE}@@
userPassword: @@{USER_PASSWORD}@@
shadowLastChange: 17058
shadowMin: 0
shadowMax: 99999
shadowWarning: 7
ou: Group
' | tee ~/@@{NEW_USER_TO_ADD}@@.ldif

/usr/bin/ldapadd -x -w @@{OPENLDAP_PASSWORD}@@ -D "cn=ldapadm,dc=ntnxdemo,dc=local" -f ~/@@{NEW_USER_TO_ADD}@@.ldif

/usr/sbin/slaptest -u >> ~/status.txt

# verify the new user was added

ldapsearch -x cn=@@{NEW_USER_TO_ADD}@@ -b dc=ntnxdemo,dc=local >> ~/status.txt
